channel.title: Need help this will only take a second
channel.description:
Is there any working clients for the classic source "PimpScape" ?
I have tried using the Silabsoft client, but the client doesn't work, Then I tried MoparScape client and it crashes. Any suggestions?
And yes I am hosting a very old source, Don't ask why.
I AM ALSO USING A WINDOWS 7 LAPTOP. It is known to crash most clients, is this why?
